subject: Never received product?
description_text:
Hi there I put in a request through your support site with freshdesk I
believe was the name and never got a reply it's been about 10 days since
Ive put in that request. The money has been withdrawn from the account but
I never got a shipping number or confirmation, Please reply as soon as
possible thank you very much.

conversations.body_text: Hi there just checking up on this as it's been 3 days since I've reported it thank you for your time.
ID 为 9332 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单9332  
      主题: No shipment after being over a week since buying?  
      描述:  Hi there I purchased the simsonn HS pro and i purchased it on the 13th. I never got a tracking number and it's never arrived. Please respond within a timely manner thank you, the order number is #SSN4809
Hi Switch Pro，  Your order has already been shipped. Please keep an eye on the tracking updates for further delivery progress.
Hi can you resend the email please as I haven't seen it thank you
Hi Switch Pro,    A shipping notification has been sent to the email address you provided.  debbievance382@gmail.com      Here is your tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELN2410427533YQ
